## IColorChannel.getChannel() method

Returns new pixel buffer of selected color channel. The extracted values are a copy of the original.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getChannel(id: C): IPixelBuffer<T, number>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | <code>C</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`IPixelBuffer<T, number>`
